title: Bali Resort Relaxation with Decadent Dining & Massages
description: Experience a tranquil break in Bali at the Swiss-Belresort Pecatu. Located just 15km from Ngurah Rai International Airport, this convenient location offers a host of activities, from surfing and golfing to hikes and sunrise yoga. Included in your escape are daily buffet breakfast, select lunches or dinners, a daily beer per adult, a 60-minute Balinese massage and more. Plus, one child aged under 11 stays for free.
offer_address: Pecatu Indah Raya Blok G2, Pecatu Indah Resort Bali, Pecatu, Kuta Sel., Kuta Selatan, Bali 80361, Indonesia
